live_updates: Crews have determined this outage is due to a fibre cut. Repairing a damaged fibre line can typically take between 8 to 12 hours, once fibre technicians are able to safely begin their work. Full restoration of services may take longer if the damage is extensive. We will continue to provide updates as our technicians assess the situation on site. Thank you for your patience.
76177.summary: Some customers in the North/Northeast areas of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
76177.title: May 6 - Calgary (Mount Pleasant & North Calgary) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
